H0.text: What was the name of the Argentine Navy cruiser which was torpedoed and sunk during the 1982 Falklands War. General Belgrano's sister ship, General San Mart√≠n

H1.text: What was the name of the Argentine Navy cruiser which was torpedoed and sunk during the 1982 Falklands War. ARA Independencia

H2.text: What was the name of the Argentine Navy cruiser which was torpedoed and sunk during the 1982 Falklands War. ARA Veinticinco de Mayo

H3.text: What was the name of the Argentine Navy cruiser which was torpedoed and sunk during the 1982 Falklands War. Belgrano

A4.text: ARA General Belgrano was an Argentine Navy light cruiser in service from 1951 until 1982.

A5.text: She was sunk on 2 May 1982 during the Falklands War by the Royal Navy submarine Conqueror with the loss of 323 lives.
